item.title: Famitsu Sales: 12/8/25 – 12/14/25
item.content:encoded:
• PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

Switch 2 sales continue to boom.

Famitsu has published its estimated physical game software data for Japan for week of December 8, 2025 to December 14, 2025.

On the hardware side, Switch 2 sold 190,944 units, the Switch family sold 31,344 units, the PlayStation 5 family sold 18,912 units, the Xbox Series family sold 183 units, and the PlayStation 4 family sold 13 units.

Get the full sales charts below.

Software Sales (followed by lifetime sales)

  1. [SW2] Mario Kart World (Nintendo, 06/05/25) – 103,861 (2,458,007)
  2. [NSW] Pokemon Legends: Z-A (The Pokemon Company, 10/16/25) – 50,292 (1,397,534)
  3. [SW2] Pokemon Legends: Z-A – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition (The Pokemon Company, 10/16/25) – 40,813 (903,190)
  4. [SW2] Kirby Air Riders (Nintendo, 11/20/25) – 39,206 (327,824)
  5. [SW2] Momotaro Dentetsu 2: Anata no Machi mo Kitto Aru – Higashi Nihon Hen + Nishi Nihon Hen – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition (Konami, 11/13/25) – 18,964 (132,058)
  6. [NSW] Momotaro Dentetsu 2: Anata no Machi mo Kitto Aru – Higashi Nihon Hen + Nishi Nihon Hen (Konami, 11/13/25) – 18,015 (177,007)
  7. [SW2] Donkey Kong Bananza (Nintendo, 07/17/25) – 12,519 (403,783)
  8. [NSW] Minecraft (Microsoft, 06/21/18) – 11,770 (4,078,169)
  9. [NSW] Animal Crossing: New Horizons (Nintendo, 03/20/20) – 9,513 (8,283,927)
  10. [SW2] Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment (Koei Tecmo, 11/06/25) – 8,001 (126,461)

Rankings 11 to 30 will be announced on December 19.

  1. [NSW] Octopath Traveler 0 (Square Enix, 12/04/25) –
  2. [SW2] Metroid Prime 4: Beyond – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition (Nintendo, 12/04/25) –
  3. [PS5] Octopath Traveler 0 (Square Enix, 12/04/25) –
  4. [SW2] Octopath Traveler 0 (Square Enix, 12/04/25) –
  5. [NSW] Metroid Prime 4: Beyond (Nintendo, 12/04/25) –
  6. [SW2] Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake (Square Enix, 10/30/25) –
  7. [NSW] Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake (Square Enix, 10/30/25) –
  8. [SW2] Super Mario Party Jamboree – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition + Jamboree TV (Nintendo, 07/24/25) –
  9. [NSW] Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 (Nintendo, 10/02/25) –
  10. [NSW] Super Smash Bros. Ultimate (Nintendo, 12/07/18) –
  11. [NSW] Super Mario Party Jamboree (Nintendo, 10/17/24) –
  12. [NSW] Mario Kart 8 Deluxe (Nintendo, 04/28/17) –
  13. [PS5] Ghost of Yotei (SIE, 10/02/25) –
  14. [NSW] Pokemon Scarlet / Pokemon Violet (The Pokemon Company, 11/18/22) –
  15. [NSW] Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – The Hinokami Chronicles 2 (Aniplex, 08/01/25) –
  16. [NSW] Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO (Bandai Namco, 11/13/25) –
  17. [NSW] Nintendo Switch Sports (Nintendo, 04/29/22) –
  18. [SW2] Tamagotchi Plaza – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition (Bandai Namco, 06/26/25) –
  19. [NSW] Football Manager 26 Touch (SEGA, 12/04/25) –
  20. [NSW] Tamagotchi Plaza (Bandai Namco, 06/26/25) –

Hardware Sales (followed by lifetime sales)

  1. Switch 2 – 190,944 (3,362,777)
  2. Switch Lite – 14,885 (6,780,048)
  3. PlayStation 5 Digital Edition – 12,671 (1,090,710)
  4. Switch OLED Model – 9,747 (9,365,054)
  5. Switch – 6,712 (20,200,082)
  6. PlayStation 5 – 3,270 (5,861,281)
  7. PlayStation 5 Pro – 2,971 (307,680)
  8. Xbox Series X Digital Edition – 131 (24,405)
  9. Xbox Series S – 33 (340,240)
  10. Xbox Series X – 19 (323,801)
  11. PlayStation 4 – 13 (7,930,124)
